data.title: Edwin Universe Pant Cropped Black
data.meta_description: A pair of trousers from Edwin made from a Spanish fabric of 100% cotton from Troficolor Mills, with a zip and button fly, a five pocket design and a woven logo patch to the rear. They have a smart, regular tapered fit.
data.text:
If you are not 100% happy with your purchase, you can request a refund using the Returns Form below.

Return costs are the responsibility of the customer.

Download a Returns Form (PDF)

When returning shoes, please do not use the shoe box as a shipping box. The shoe box is part of the product and we cannot refund if it is damaged or has labels on it. The shoe box must be complete and free of labels.

All returned items must be in perfect, saleable condition. We reserve the right to determine whether an item is saleable. We cannot refund if an item is unsaleable. To be considered saleable, an item must meet the following criteria:

Tags have not been removed

Items don't smell of smoke, perfume or aftershave.

Have not been washed

Unmarked, not soiled or damaged in any way.

Shoe soles are unmarked

Shoes not worn outside

Shoe boxes are unmarked and not written on.

Re-package and return at your Post Office via Royal Mail to :

Working Class Heroes,

42 Market Street,

Ulverston, Cumbria,

LA12 7LS

Please allow 10 (ten) business days to process your return (we aim for 2 days)

Monday to Friday (9 am to 5 pm) are considered "business days".

Once your return is processed, please allow up to 5 (five) business days for the money to appear in your bank account ( this is the bank's policy, not ours)

Make a note of your tracking number as we are unable to provide you with one for the return.
